title: Topic 003 Question 044
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains an Azure SQL managed instance named SQLMI1 and a Log Analytics workspace named Workspace1.
You need to collect performance metrics for SQLMI1 and stream the metrics to Workspace.
options: Create a private endpoint connection on SQLMI1.
Configure Azure SQL Analytics to use Workspace1.
Modify the Compute + storage settings for SQLMI1.
Modify the diagnostic settings for SQLMI1.
